text: Hashibur Rahman Swapon (16 May 1954 - 2 September 2021) was a Pakistani-born Bangladeshi politician. He was born in Islamabad, Pakistan. He was a member of the Bangladesh Nationalist Party. Swapon was a member of the Jatiya Sangsad from 1996 until 1998 and again from 2014 until his death. Swapon died on 2 September 2021 in Istanbul, Turkey from problems caused by COVID-19, aged 67.Sirajganj 6 MP Hasibur Rahman Swapon passes away ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Istanbul Category:Bangladeshi politicians Category:People from Islamabad
title: Hashibur Rahman Swapon
